data.text: Adzuke Mulungu, adani ake amwazikane;
Monga momwe mphepo imachotsera utsi; Inu muwawulutsire kutali.
Koma olungama asangalale
Imbirani Mulungu imbirani dzina lake matamando,
Atate wa ana amasiye, mtetezi wa akazi amasiye,
Mulungu amakhazikitsa mtima pansi osungulumwa mʼmabanja,
Pamene munatuluka kutsogolera anthu anu, Inu Mulungu,
dziko lapansi linagwedezeka, miyamba inakhuthula pansi mvula,
Munapereka mivumbi yochuluka, Inu Mulungu;
Anthu anu anakhala mʼmenemo
Ambuye analengeza mawu,
“Mafumu ndi ankhondo anathawa mwaliwiro;
Ngakhale mukugona pakati pa makola a ziweto,
Pamene Wamphamvuzonse anabalalitsa mafumu mʼdziko,
Mapiri a Basani ndi mapiri aulemerero;
Muyangʼaniranji mwansanje inu mapiri a msonga zambiri,
Magaleta a Mulungu ndi osawerengeka,
Pamene Inu munakwera mmwamba,
Matamando akhale kwa Ambuye, kwa Mulungu Mpulumutsi wathu
Mulungu wathu ndi Mulungu amene amapulumutsa;
Ndithu Mulungu adzaphwanya mitu ya adani ake,
Ambuye akunena kuti, “Ndidzawabweretsa kuchokera ku Basani;
Kuti muviyike mapazi anu mʼmagazi a adani anu,
Mayendedwe aulemu a anthu anu aonekera poyera, Inu Mulungu;
Patsogolo pali oyimba nyimbo pakamwa, pambuyo pawo oyimba nyimbo ndi zipangizo;
Tamandani Mulungu mu msonkhano waukulu;
Pali fuko lalingʼono la Benjamini, kuwatsogolera,
Kungani mphamvu zanu Mulungu;
Chifukwa cha Nyumba yanu ku Yerusalemu,
Dzudzulani chirombo pakati pa mabango,
Nthumwi zidzachokera ku Igupto;
Imbirani Mulungu Inu mafumu a dziko lapansi
Kwa Iye amene amakwera pa mitambo yakalekale ya mmwamba
Lengezani za mphamvu za Mulungu,
Ndinu woopsa, Inu Mulungu mʼmalo anu opatulika;
